text: @SouthernOracle4 The third, in an artillery uniform, was sitting on the sofa, and she too waved her hand to Alexei Alexandrovich.

passages.fragment: The third , in an artillery uniform , was sitting on
passages.full_quote: <used>The third, in an artillery uniform, was sitting on</used> a portmanteau beside them

Konstantin Levin looked in at the door, and saw that the speaker was a young man with an immense shock of hair, wearing a Russian coat, and that a pock-marked young woman in a woolen gown, without collar or cuffs<used>, was sitting on the sofa</used>

She, wearing the dark lilac dress she had worn during the first days of their married life, and put on again today- a dress particularly remembered and loved by him- <used>was sitting on the sofa, t</used>he same old-fashioned leather sofa which had always stood in the study in Levin's father's and grandfather's days

passages.fragment: on the sofa , and she too
passages.full_quote: The Countess came in, sat down <used>on the sofa, and she too</used> asked after his wife and inquired about the concert

passages.fragment: , and she too waved her hand to Alexei Alexandrovich
passages.full_quote: The lady smiled a kindly smile too<used>, and she too waved her hand to Alexei Alexandrovich</used>
